definitions.definition: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
To change one's course of action; to take a new approach.

definitions.example: They say they can turn the parts in two days.
We turned a pretty penny with that little scheme.

definitions.definition: Of a player, to go past an opposition player with the ball in one's control.
To undergo the process of turning on a lathe.
To bring down the feet of a child in the womb, in order to facilitate delivery.
To invert a type of the same thickness, as a temporary substitute for any sort which is exhausted.
To magically or divinely attack undead.
